item.description:
Crow Hill is likely the best climbing in MA. Plenty of routes and a 90 foot tall wall in spots. You can lead here too (at your own risk.)

We will set up our ropes and climb about 3 hours. Please bring water, sunscreen...

We will meet for car pooling at 9 AM.
Meet at the big red wind mill sculpture at Porter Square T stop. Be on time.

Directions to Crow Hill. Find Leominster State Forest (www.state.ma.us/dem/parks/lmsf.htm). Take route 2 to rt 31 south (exit 28) go south 1.3 miles to park head quarters. (get free climbing permit.) There are two Parking lots. Go to the second parking lot on the left. I wiill be in this Parking Lot at 10:45 AM - 11AM then head up the hill. (Look for my small Silver Toyota.) If this parking lot isn't open - go further down and look on the right.

Geoff
617 501-6217
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear a red shirt. Or call me 617 501-6217 (reception might be on/off at the hill.)
item.name: Crow Hill, top roping
